subtitle: what do we tell our children in times
like this we'd love to protect them from
these Horrors but either they will hear
about it or is it even wise to just make
believe that it's not happening so here
are a few words to parents and to
Educators this is an opportunity an
opportunity of a lifetime actually to
teach your children the most important
lessons in life and that is that God
created a world with his light and
darkness as we read in these weeks in
this week's Book of Genesis in the
beginning of Genesis there's good and
evil and he says choose good choose life
something you and I can choose any given
time there are people unfortunately that
choose the opposite when we see that we
have to protect ourselves and defend
ourselves and eradicate it but we have
to then increase more in our own
goodness have your children do a Mitzvah
a good deed a prayer before they go to
sleep when they wake up make them
cognizant of this
